amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part C of House Report 117-432 to revise the collateral requirements so borrowers can obtain a disaster loan for up to $25,000 from the Small Business Administration without pledging any collateral.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 296 - 128 (Roll no. 412).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Velazquez.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 296 - 128 (Roll no. 412).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
